head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STEBBINS, JOSEPHINE SMALL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STEBBINS, JOSEPHINE SMALL

block.p: STEBBINS-Josephine Small. On June 8, 2000 at the age of 93. Widow of Rowland Stebbins, Jr. Mother of Rowland Stebbins, III and the late Vail Stebbins DuBois. Grandmother of Malcolm M. Wallop, O. Matthew Wallop, Amy W. Mann, Paul S. Wallop, Rowland Stebbins, IV and the late Cameron D. Stebbins. Funeral service at St. James Church, Madison Ave. at 71st St. 2:00pm, Wednesday, June 14.

STEBBINS-Josephine Small. On June 8, 2000 at the age of 93. Widow of Rowland Stebbins, Jr. Mother of Rowland Stebbins, III and the late Vail Stebbins DuBois. Grandmother of Malcolm M. Wallop, O.
